author: castagna
msg: LARQ is not distributed via a .zip binary dist and the target audience is expert users or developers who want to extend ARQ or applications using ARQ. Let's try to see if a one jar approach works for them, instead of shell scripts.

author: hadrian
msg: Update xmlsecurity tests to use the junit4 based camel test support. Fixed minor warnings.

author: mduerig
msg: OAK-38: KernelNodeState should handle multi valued properties

author: jdyer
msg: SOLR-3011: Extensive bug fixes for "threads" parameter.  Also added deprecation a warning when using "threads".
